text:
Hello fellow professionals!! My name is <https://www.linkedin.com/in/djmatheny18/|David Matheny >and I am a Digital PR, SEO & Social Media Specialist with 3 years of experience. My background spans a lot of different sectors such as political science & campaign finance, grassroots organizing, nonprofits, agency, and I run my own business providing a wide variety of digital PR, marketing, development, and management services - check out my LinkedIn to learn more (linked above on my name).

I’m so excited to be part of this community and continue to grow alongside all of the outstanding professionals who are part of this group. I love making new connections, so please don’t hesitate to reach out and connect. Virtual coffee is always great.:smile:

I am currently based out of Columbus, Ohio, and dream of becoming a digital nomad someday. I am extremely passionate about nature/climate, hiking, helping organizations improve their PR and DEI efforts, and speaking up for underrepresented groups/voices. I am incredibly passionate about LGBTQ+ and other minority groups’ rights and equality.

I am also looking for a new opportunity in my field. If anyone is interested in speaking more, I would love to set up a time to chat.
